IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.save_action_bar') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.save_action_bar GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.save_action_bar @character_id dbo.id_t, @count_id TINYINT, @position TINYINT, @code dbo.code_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON DECLARE @sql VARCHAR(255)
SET @sql = 'UPDATE dbo.ActionBars SET code_' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), @position) + ' = ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), @code) + ' WHERE character_id = ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), @character_id) + ' AND count_id = ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), @count_id)
exec (@sql)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
